flag = dsc{t00_much_m4th_8898}
hex(flag) = 6473637b7430305f6d7563685f6d3474685f383839387d
decimal(hex(flag)) = 9621269132073872010525638902903988134500010392708266109

M = 9621269132073872010525638902903988134500010392708266109

p = 5051525354555657585960616263
q = 4655885807254867892895911581

n = p * q
n = 23519325203263800569051788832344215043304346715918641803

phi = (p-1) * (q-1)
phi = 23519325203263800569051788822636803881493821237062113960

e = 71

d = pow(e, -1, phi)
d = 8943968739269332610766173214242164856342720752122212351

c = 10400286653072418349777706076384847966640064725838262071


given to user:
cyphertext = 10400286653072418349777706076384847966640064725838262071
n = 23519325203263800569051788832344215043304346715918641803
e = 71

solution:

1) find p, q by prime factoring n
2) calculate phi using p and q
3) calculate d using e and phi
4) obtain plaintext number using d, cyphertext and n
5) convert plaintext number to hex code
6) convert hex code to flag
